title: Bugged Queues
body: It's really annoying when you sit through your 20min priority queue only to end up waiting 20min for an Aram queue (7pm)  to realise that it's fucking bugged and you need to requeue and sit through the 20min priority queue AGAIN to queue up. THANKS RITO. Thanks for giving me a priority queue for letting the enemy team push mid when we had 2 people troll leave at 1min.
